abstract: Rep Carolyn B Maloney says she is closer to goal of bringing pair of pandas to New York City, task intended to bring New Yorkers some source of happiness following number of crises, including 9/11 and Hurricane Sandy; plans to create privately funded facility at Bronx Zoo are underway, although talks with Chinese officials to convince them to relinquish a pair of bears, very difficult undertaking, are only in initial stages.
lead_paragraph: After terrorist attacks, the financial crisis and natural disasters, Representative Carolyn B. Maloney believes the city could benefit from hosting the animals from China.

headline.main: Congresswoman’s Long Quest: Bringing Pandas to New York

snippet: After terrorist attacks, the financial crisis and natural disasters, Representative Carolyn B. Maloney believes the city could benefit from hosting the animals from China.
